other_tests.findings: Atrial fibrillation with intermittent pacing and bifascicular block, with ST-segment depression, T-wave inversion, and Q waves in leads V1 and V2.
Left ventricular ejection fraction of 15%, with a diffusely hypokinetic right ventricle and a right ventricular systolic pressure of 36 mm Hg, and no vegetations.

Toxic granulation and vacuolization of neutrophils, occasional Döhle’s bodies, and some neutrophils contained intracytoplasmic bluish-purple inclusions resembling microcolonies of bacteria within endosomes.
